public class LogFile extends Object
Helps to keep track of all transactions

      Parameters:

      amount - The withdrawal amount

    • logInternalTransfer

      public void logInternalTransfer(Customer customer, Account fromAccount, Account toAccount, double amount)
      Logs an internal transfer transaction between accounts of the same customer.
      Parameters:
      customer - The customer making the transfer
      fromAccount - The account from which money is transferred
      toAccount - The account receiving the transfer
      amount - The transfer amount

    • logExternalTransfer

      public void logExternalTransfer(Customer sender, Account senderAccount, Account receiverAccount, double amount)
      Logs an external transfer transaction to another customer's account.
      Parameters:
      sender - The customer sending the money
      senderAccount - The account of the sender
      receiverAccount - The account of the receiver
      amount - The transfer amount
